text: hi everyone I am Niharika it's time to

that's a bit steep and when do you use

not very expensive but it's just a

are little expensive so rather than

alright the second phrase that I have

is not
are expensive but a little high-priced

use expression that's a bit steep or

that
so then something is super expensive

the tax
so offenders would have their nose slit
